name: Odd Command
desc:
Adj. allies gain Odd Tempo+.
Unit gains +5 Damage given/taken for every adj. ally.
components: 5*len([unitx for unitx in game.get_all_units() if unitx.team in 'player other' and unitx.nid is not unit.nid and utils.calculate_distance(unit.position,unitx.position) <= 1])
5*len([unitx for unitx in game.get_all_units() if unitx.team in 'player other' and unitx.nid is not unit.nid and utils.calculate_distance(unit.position,unitx.position) <= 1])
